エンジン

起動

対話起動
C++ -
C# -
VB -
Java -
PHP $ php -a
JS $ node
Ruby $ irb
Python $ python
Perl $ perl -d -e 1
C++ C# VB Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
対話起動 - - - - $ php -a $ node $ irb $ python $ perl -d -e 1

変数・定数

変数宣言

変数宣言 グローバル変数 局所変数
C++ int v = 10; int g = 10; // 関数外で宣言 {
   int p = 10;
}
C# int v = 10; public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		{
   int p = 10;
}
VB Dim v As Integer = 10; public g as Integer = 10; If True Then
   Dim p As Integer = 10
End
Java int v = 10; public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		{
   int p = 10;
}
PHP $v = 10; global $g = 10; function foo(){
   $p = 10;
}
JS var v = 10; window.g = 10; function foo(){
   var p = 10;
}
Ruby v = 10 $g = 10 def foo
   p = 10
end
Python v = 10 global g def foo():
   p = 10
Perl my $v = 10; our $g = 10; {
   my $p = 10;
}
C++ C# VB Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
変数宣言 int v = 10; int v = 10; Dim v As Integer = 10; int v = 10; $v = 10; var v = 10; v = 10 v = 10 my $v = 10;
グローバル変数 int g = 10; // 関数外で宣言 public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		public g as Integer = 10; public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		global $g = 10; window.g = 10; $g = 10 global g our $g = 10;
局所変数 {
   int p = 10;
} 		{
   int p = 10;
} 		If True Then
   Dim p As Integer = 10
End 		{
   int p = 10;
} 		function foo(){
   $p = 10;
} 		function foo(){
   var p = 10;
} 		def foo
   p = 10
end 		def foo():
   p = 10 		{
   my $p = 10;
}

整数リテラル

10進 16進 8進 2進
C++ 255 0xFF 0377 -
C# 255 0xFF - -
VB 255 &HFF &O377 -
Java 255 0xFF 0377 -
PHP 255 0xFF 0377 0b11111111
JS 255 0xFF 0377 -
Ruby 255 0xFF 0377, 0o377 0b11111111
Python 255 0xFF 0377 0b11111111
Perl 255 0xFF 0377 0b11111111
C++ C# VB Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
10進 255 255 255 255 255 255 255 255 255
16進 0xFF 0xFF &HFF 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF 0xFF
8進 0377 - &O377 0377 0377 0377 0377, 0o377 0377 0377
2進 - - - - 0b11111111 - 0b11111111 0b11111111 0b11111111

定数宣言

定数宣言
C++ const int C = 10;
C# const int C = 10;
VB Const C As Integer = 10
Java static final int C = 10;
PHP define('C', 10);
JS const C = 10;
Ruby C = 10
Python -
Perl use constant C => 10;
C++ C# VB Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
定数宣言 const int C = 10; const int C = 10; Const C As Integer = 10 static final int C = 10; define('C', 10); const C = 10; C = 10 - use constant C => 10;

演算

論理演算

論理OR 論理AND 論理NOT
C++ a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
C# a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
VB a = b Or c a = b And c a = Not b
Java a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
PHP a = $b || $c; a = $b && $c; a = !$b;
JS a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
Ruby a = b || c
a = (b or c) 		a = b && c
a = (b or c) 		a = !b
a = (not b)
Python a = b || c; a = b && c; a = !b;
Perl $a = $b || $c;
$a = ($b or $c); 		$a = $b && $c;
$a = ($b and $c); 		$a = !$b;
$a = not $b;
C++ C# VB Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
論理OR a = b || c; a = b || c; a = b Or c a = b || c; a = $b || $c; a = b || c; a = b || c
a = (b or c) 		a = b || c; $a = $b || $c;
$a = ($b or $c);
論理AND a = b && c; a = b && c; a = b And c a = b && c; a = $b && $c; a = b && c; a = b && c
a = (b or c) 		a = b && c; $a = $b && $c;
$a = ($b and $c);
論理NOT a = !b; a = !b; a = Not b a = !b; a = !$b; a = !b; a = !b
a = (not b) 		a = !b; $a = !$b;
$a = not $b;

ビット演算

ビットOR ビットAND ビットNOT ビットXOR
C++ a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
C# a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
VB a = b Or c a = b And c a = Not b a = b Xor c
Java a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
PHP $a = $b | $c; $a = $b & $c; $a = ~$b; $a = $b ^ $c;
JS a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
Ruby a = b | c a = b & c a = ~b a = b ^ c
Python a = b | c; a = b & c; a = ~b; a = b ^ c;
Perl $a = $b | $c; $a = $b & $c; $a = ~$b; $a = $b ^ $c;
C++ C# VB Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
ビットOR a = b | c; a = b | c; a = b Or c a = b | c; $a = $b | $c; a = b | c; a = b | c a = b | c; $a = $b | $c;
ビットAND a = b & c; a = b & c; a = b And c a = b & c; $a = $b & $c; a = b & c; a = b & c a = b & c; $a = $b & $c;
ビットNOT a = ~b; a = ~b; a = Not b a = ~b; $a = ~$b; a = ~b; a = ~b a = ~b; $a = ~$b;
ビットXOR a = b ^ c; a = b ^ c; a = b Xor c a = b ^ c; $a = $b ^ $c; a = b ^ c; a = b ^ c a = b ^ c; $a = $b ^ $c;

BOOL

True定数 False定数 True判定 False判定
C++ true false False判定以外 false, 0
C# true false true false
VB True False True False
Java true false true false
PHP TRUE (大小文字区別無) FALSE (大小文字区別無) False判定以外 FALSE, 0, NULL, '', '0', [], 未定義
JS true false False判定以外 false, undefined, 0, ''
Ruby true false False判定以外 false, nil
Python True False False判定以外 False, 0, '', (), [], {}
Perl - - False判定以外 0, '', '0'
C++ C# VB Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
True定数 true true True true TRUE (大小文字区別無) true true True -
False定数 false false False false FALSE (大小文字区別無) false false False -
True判定 False判定以外 true True true False判定以外 False判定以外 False判定以外 False判定以外 False判定以外
False判定 false, 0 false False false FALSE, 0, NULL, '', '0', [], 未定義 false, undefined, 0, '' false, nil False, 0, '', (), [], {} 0, '', '0'
